div.head: Description of changes for 2012.10
div.p: This is the first public version of this text. It is a first draft copied from a descriptive transcription of the St. Victor manuscript. A transcription of the Sorbonne manuscript still needs to be completed. Additions and corrections await a collation comparison of available manuscript witnesses. Difficult transcriptions have been marked as unclear. Ref pointers have been added to most name elements. Cross-references, citaitons, and a critical apparatus still await construction.
